name: Miyagi Slime
description:
We've taken our time to re-imagine the classic retro game Asteroids into something more modern; using Japanese cultures along the lines. Due to so, we changed the ‘asteroids’  into slimes. The slimes will split into smaller slimes similarly to how the asteroids split in the original title. To build on the concept in our revised game the slimes will actively try hunt the player down unlike in asteroids where they are more of an obstacle to avoid.

In our game you trying to protect a shrine, so you cannot just try to dodge the slimes as they will attack the shrine if you get too far away. Instead of fighting from range you will also have the option to fight with melee weapons which change how you approach the game.
